themes: need for structural support beyond funding
visibility and outreach to struggling artists
key_phrases: stable ground that artists can utilize instead of just funding
build structure that elevates the artists
centralized hub for them to find
services that float drift away from those struggling to find a life raft
islands are easier to spot, find and swim to
build a metaphorical lighthouse of awareness
draw in those most in need
barriers_identified: lack of stable, accessible support structures
difficulty for struggling artists to find and access services
solutions_proposed: create a stable, structured support system beyond just funding
establish a centralized hub for artists
increase visibility and awareness through a 'lighthouse' approach to outreach
